text: Glenn Wesley Schlechty (March 31, 1912 – April 3, 1962) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Dayton Metropolitans in four games during the 1937–38 season and averaged 1.8 points per game. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1962 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Ohio Category:Dayton Metropolitans players Category:Findlay Oilers men's basketball players Category:Forwards (basketball)
title: Glenn Schlechty
